head.title: The Silver Lining in Chernobyl's Cloud

hedline.hl1: The Silver Lining in Chernobyl's Cloud

abstract.p: M Anthony Fitchue letter on Matthew Brzezinski's September 10 article notes he offered prayer to Leonid Aniskin and his family for continuing to live and work in Chernobyl (S)

block.p: After reading Matthew Brzezinski's article (Sept. 3), I actually threw the magazine to the floor and uttered a prayer for the Aniskin family. Leonid Aniskin is knowingly sacrificing his life for an apartment, a decent job and a chance for his kid to have a good life. That the Aniskins chose Slavutich knowing the dangers is an index of their economic desperation. This has got to be one of the most God-awful human tragedies in recent memory, and a lesson in political pragmatism run amok in full view of the world community.
